    Code

    ipt~ : Real-Time Instrumental Playing Techniques Recognition

    Max/MSP external and Python tools for recognizing instrumental playing techniques in real-time.
    Repository: ipt_tilde

    Real-Time Model Training Toolkit for Electric Guitar IPT Recognition

    Python-based toolkit for training electric guitar playing technique classifiers. Includes data augmentation, preprocessing, model training, and export to .ts format.
    Repository: nime2025
